message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $9,500. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget considerations, but $8,200 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $8,800?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I think $8,800 is still a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $8,600?
